title: Flight Simulator 2020 - POI's - France - Abbey Church of Saint-Savin
description:
In this video we will fly over the Abbey Church of Saint-Savin . Known as the 'Romanesque Sistine Chapel', the Abbey-Church of Saint-Savin contains many beautiful 11th- and 12th-century murals which are still in a remarkable state of preservation.
